subtitle: This is a really easy dessert. Serve with ready-to-serve custard or a dollop of creme fraiche.

method.text: Rub the butter into the flour until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Stir in the oats and half the sugar.
Spoon the fruit into an ovenproof dish. Sprinkle over the remaining sugar and the cinnamon.
Spoon the crumble mixture over the fruit.
Bake in the oven for about 40-45 min or until fruit is just soft and tender and the crumble is golden and crispy. Serve hot.

title: Spiced apple and plum oaty crumble
